com.github.breadmoirai.samurai7.database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.breadmoirai.samurai7.database.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a Singleton instance of a JDBC compatible database. In order to use the Database, a connection must be provided to create(ConnectionFactory).

      • get

        public static Database get()

      • create

        public static void create(org.jdbi.v3.core.ConnectionFactory connectionFactory)
        Supply a connection to a database.

        This can be used with a lambda expression as such: 

         
 Database.create(() -> DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:derby:myDB;create=true"))
        Parameters:
        connectionFactory - This is equivalent to a Supplier<Connection>
